task.en: Go into the Maps app and open settings of the app.
task.zh: 打开地图app，随后打开它的设置。
task.ar: افتح تطبيق الخرائط، ثم افتح إعدادات التطبيق.
task.ja: マップアプリを開いて、その設定を開いてください。
task.ru: Откройте приложение "Карты" и перейдите к настройкам приложения.

grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get name of first process whose frontmost is true' | grep -q "Maps" >/dev/null && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Settings" >/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get name of first process whose frontmost is true' | grep -q "Maps" >/dev/null && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "设置" >/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get name of first process whose frontmost is true' | grep -q "Maps" >/dev/null && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "الإعدادات" >/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get name of first process whose frontmost is true' | grep -q "Maps" >/dev/null && echo "True" || echo "False"
